issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The pollednotifications service is used by simple workflow to support long polling. The simple workflow service bootstrapper should declare this dependency to prevent the service being enable when it cannot be used:

{code}
Wed Nov 5 18:07:41 2014 ERROR [SimpleWorkflowService:SimpleWorkflow.26] [com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SimpleWorkflowService.handleTaskPolling(SimpleWorkflowService.java):2218] Error polling for task decision/CloudFormationDomain/CloudFormationTaskList
java.util.NoSuchElementException: Failed to lookup ENABLED service of type PolledNotifications.
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology.lookup(Topology.java:1022)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.NotifyClient.pollTaskList(NotifyClient.java:142)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.NotifyClient.pollTaskList(NotifyClient.java:134)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SimpleWorkflowService.handleTaskPolling(SimpleWorkflowService.java:2196)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SimpleWorkflowService.pollForDecisionTask(SimpleWorkflowService.java:1292)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor378.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
        at org.mule.model.resolvers.AbstractEntryPointResolver.invokeMethod(AbstractEntryPointResolver.java:151)
        at org.mule.model.resolvers.ReflectionEntryPointResolver.invoke(ReflectionEntryPointResolver.java:121)
        at org.mule.model.resolvers.DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.invoke(DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.java:39)
        at org.mule.component.DefaultComponentLifecycleAdapter.invoke(DefaultComponentLifecycleAdapter.java:343)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.invokeComponentInstance(AbstractJavaComponent.java:86)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.doInvoke(AbstractJavaComponent.java:77)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent.invokeInternal(AbstractComponent.java:126)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent.access$000(AbstractComponent.java:61)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent$1$1.process(AbstractComponent.java:242)
        at org.mule.execution.ExceptionToMessagingExceptionExecutionInterceptor.execute(ExceptionToMessagingExceptionExecutionInterceptor.java:27)
        at org.mule.execution.MessageProcessorNotificationExecutionInterceptor.execute(MessageProcessorNotificationExecutionInterceptor.java:61)
        at org.mule.execution.MessageProcessorExecutionTemplate.execute(MessageProcessorExecutionTemplate.java:47)
        at org.mule.processor.chain.DefaultMessageProcessorChain.doProcess(DefaultMessageProcessorChain.java:95)
        at org.mule.processor.chain.AbstractMessageProcessorChain.process(AbstractMessageProcessorChain.java:70)
        at org.mule.processor.chain.InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper.doProcess(InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper.java:54)
        at org.mule.processor.chain.AbstractMessageProcessorChain.process(AbstractMessageProcessorChain.java:70)
        at org.mule.processor.chain.InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper.access$001(InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper.java:26)
        at org.mule.processor.chain.InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper$1.process(InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper.java:70)
        at org.mule.execution.ExceptionToMessagingExceptionExecutionInterceptor.execute(ExceptionToMessagingExceptionExecutionInterceptor.java:27)
        at org.mule.execution.MessageProcessorNotificationExecutionInterceptor.execute(MessageProcessorNotificationExecutionInterceptor.java:61)
        at org.mule.execution.MessageProcessorExecutionTemplate.execute(MessageProcessorExecutionTemplate.java:47)
        at org.mule.processor.chain.InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper.process(InterceptingChainLifecycleWrapper.java:65)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent.process(AbstractComponent.java:160)
        at org.mule.service.processor.ServiceInternalMessageProcessor.process(ServiceInternalMessageProcessor.java:44)
        at org.mule.execution.ExceptionToMessagingExceptionExecutionInterceptor.execute(ExceptionToMessagingExceptionExecutionInterceptor.java:27)
        at org.mule.execution.MessageProcessorNotificationExecutionInterceptor.execute(MessageProcessorNotificationExecutionInterceptor.java:61)
        at org.mule.execution.MessageProcessorExecutionTemplate.execute(MessageProcessorExecutionTemplate.java:47)
        at org.mule.processor.AbstractInterceptingMessageProcessorBase.processNext(AbstractInterceptingMessageProcessorBase.java:106)
        at org.mule.interceptor.AbstractEnvelopeInterceptor.process(AbstractEnvelopeInterceptor.java:55)
        at org.mule.processor.AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor.processNextTimed(AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor.java:122)
        at org.mule.processor.AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor$AsyncMessageProcessorWorker$1.process(AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor.java:192)
        at org.mule.processor.AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor$AsyncMessageProcessorWorker$1.process(AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor.java:185)
        at org.mule.execution.ExecuteCallbackInterceptor.execute(ExecuteCallbackInterceptor.java:20)
        at org.mule.execution.HandleExceptionInterceptor.execute(HandleExceptionInterceptor.java:34)
        at org.mule.execution.HandleExceptionInterceptor.execute(HandleExceptionInterceptor.java:18)
        at org.mule.execution.BeginAndResolveTransactionInterceptor.execute(BeginAndResolveTransactionInterceptor.java:58)
        at org.mule.execution.ResolvePreviousTransactionInterceptor.execute(ResolvePreviousTransactionInterceptor.java:48)
        at org.mule.execution.SuspendXaTransactionInterceptor.execute(SuspendXaTransactionInterceptor.java:54)
        at org.mule.execution.ValidateTransactionalStateInterceptor.execute(ValidateTransactionalStateInterceptor.java:44)
        at org.mule.execution.IsolateCurrentTransactionInterceptor.execute(IsolateCurrentTransactionInterceptor.java:44)
        at org.mule.execution.ExternalTransactionInterceptor.execute(ExternalTransactionInterceptor.java:52)
        at org.mule.execution.RethrowExceptionInterceptor.execute(RethrowExceptionInterceptor.java:32)
        at org.mule.execution.RethrowExceptionInterceptor.execute(RethrowExceptionInterceptor.java:17)
        at org.mule.execution.TransactionalErrorHandlingExecutionTemplate.execute(TransactionalErrorHandlingExecutionTemplate.java:113)
        at org.mule.execution.TransactionalErrorHandlingExecutionTemplate.execute(TransactionalErrorHandlingExecutionTemplate.java:34)
        at org.mule.processor.AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor$AsyncMessageProcessorWorker.doRun(AsyncInterceptingMessageProcessor.java:184)
        at org.mule.work.AbstractMuleEventWork.run(AbstractMuleEventWork.java:43)
{code}
fields.summary: SimpleWorkflow service should depend on pollednotifications

comments.body:
[~tony]/[~sjones]:

Tested per [~sjones]'s instructions on [Group #1 cloud|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/Euca+4.1+Quality+Dashboard#Euca4.1QualityDashboard-Group#1], and both simple workflow and cloudformation went to NOTREADY state.  Therefore, fix has been verified.

*Steps*

# Sourced cloud admin credentials on [Group #1|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/Euca+4.1+Quality+Dashboard#Euca4.1QualityDashboard-Group#1] cloud
# Confirmed that all services were in ENABLED state:
{code}
$ euca-describe-services
SERVICE	user-api          	API_12    	API_12               	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/User-API	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:user-api:API_12/
SERVICE	autoscaling       	API_12    	API_12.autoscaling   	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:autoscaling:API_12.autoscaling/
SERVICE	cloudformation    	API_12    	API_12.cloudformation	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudFormation	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudformation:API_12.cloudformation/
SERVICE	cloudwatch        	API_12    	API_12.cloudwatch    	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudwatch:API_12.cloudwatch/
SERVICE	compute           	API_12    	API_12.compute       	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:compute:API_12.compute/
SERVICE	euare             	API_12    	API_12.euare         	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Euare	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:euare:API_12.euare/
SERVICE	imaging           	API_12    	API_12.imaging       	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:imaging:API_12.imaging/
SERVICE	loadbalancing     	API_12    	API_12.loadbalancing 	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:loadbalancing:API_12.loadbalancing/
SERVICE	objectstorage     	API_12    	API_12.objectstorage 	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:objectstorage:API_12.objectstorage/
SERVICE	simpleworkflow    	API_12    	API_12.simpleworkflow	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/SimpleWorkflow	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:simpleworkflow:API_12.simpleworkflow/
SERVICE	tokens            	API_12    	API_12.tokens        	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:tokens:API_12.tokens/
SERVICE	bootstrap         	bootstrap 	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	reporting         	bootstrap 	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	pollednotifications	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/PolledNotifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::pollednotifications:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	imagingbackend    	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/ImagingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imagingbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	notifications     	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	eucalyptus        	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	loadbalancingbackend	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	jetty             	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Jetty	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	dns               	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Dns	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	autoscalingbackend	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	cluster           	one       	CC_13                	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.13:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:CC_13/
SERVICE	storage           	one       	SC_13                	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.13:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:storage:SC_13/
SERVICE	cluster           	two       	CC_23                	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.23:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:cluster:CC_23/
SERVICE	storage           	two       	SC_23                	ENABLED 	84  	http://10.111.5.23:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:storage:SC_23/
{code}
# Disabled the polled notification service
{code}
$ euca-modify-service -s STOPPED arn:euca:eucalyptus::pollednotifications:10.111.5.12/
RESPONSE true

$ euca-describe-services
SERVICE	user-api          	API_12    	API_12               	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/User-API	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:user-api:API_12/
SERVICE	autoscaling       	API_12    	API_12.autoscaling   	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:autoscaling:API_12.autoscaling/
SERVICE	cloudformation    	API_12    	API_12.cloudformation	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudFormation	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudformation:API_12.cloudformation/
SERVICE	cloudwatch        	API_12    	API_12.cloudwatch    	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudwatch:API_12.cloudwatch/
SERVICE	compute           	API_12    	API_12.compute       	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:compute:API_12.compute/
SERVICE	euare             	API_12    	API_12.euare         	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Euare	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:euare:API_12.euare/
SERVICE	imaging           	API_12    	API_12.imaging       	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:imaging:API_12.imaging/
SERVICE	loadbalancing     	API_12    	API_12.loadbalancing 	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:loadbalancing:API_12.loadbalancing/
SERVICE	objectstorage     	API_12    	API_12.objectstorage 	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:objectstorage:API_12.objectstorage/
SERVICE	simpleworkflow    	API_12    	API_12.simpleworkflow	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/SimpleWorkflow	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:simpleworkflow:API_12.simpleworkflow/
SERVICE	tokens            	API_12    	API_12.tokens        	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:tokens:API_12.tokens/
SERVICE	bootstrap         	bootstrap 	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	reporting         	bootstrap 	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	pollednotifications	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	STOPPED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/PolledNotifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::pollednotifications:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	imagingbackend    	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/ImagingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imagingbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	notifications     	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	eucalyptus        	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	loadbalancingbackend	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	jetty             	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Jetty	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.5.12/

SERVICE	storage           	two       	SC_23                	ENABLED 	85  	http://10.111.5.23:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:storage:SC_23/

# Described services, and checked for NOTREADY services
{code}
$ euca-describe-services | grep NOTREADY
SERVICE	cloudformation    	API_12    	API_12.cloudformation	NOTREADY	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudFormation	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudformation:API_12.cloudformation/
SERVICE	simpleworkflow    	API_12    	API_12.simpleworkflow	NOTREADY	85  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/SimpleWorkflow	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:simpleworkflow:API_12.simpleworkflow/
{code}
# Changed polled notifications back to ENABLED
{code}
$ euca-modify-service -s ENABLED arn:euca:eucalyptus::pollednotifications:10.111.5.12/
RESPONSE true
{code}
